entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 27 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the morning then steady. POP 60%
